abstract: This year’s annual auction for a lunch with Warren E. Buffett kicked off Sunday, and the billionaire investor said he hopes it will again draw multimillion-dollar bids to benefit the Glide Foundation, which provides social services to the poor and homeless in San Francisco.
snippet: This year’s annual auction for a lunch with Warren E. Buffett kicked off Sunday, and the billionaire investor said he hopes it will again draw multimillion-dollar bids to benefit the Glide Foundation, which provides social services to the poor and...
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett always tries to make sure that anyone who’s willing to make a seven-figure donation just to have lunch with the billionaire investor gets their money’s worth, so the meals often last more than three hours.
